thread.title: ​Elton John will release 33rd studio album next year
thread.title_full: ​Elton John will release 33rd studio album next year

title: ​Elton John will release 33rd studio album next year
text:
​Elton John will release 33rd studio album next year 
CBS News Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Elton John is still standing - and will release his 33rd studio album next year.John's publicists announced Thursday that "Wonderful Crazy Night" is set for release on Island Records on Feb. 5. The first single, "Looking Up," is out on Friday....
